text: Patient_ID: FAM2025-001, Name: Emily Chen, Age: 32, Gender: Female, Occupation: Software Engineer, Allergies: Penicillin (rash), Past_Medical_History: Mild asthma, Seasonal allergies, Family_History: Mother: Type 2 diabetes; Father: Hypertension, Current_Medications: Albuterol inhaler PRN, Montelukast 10 mg nightly, Visit_Date: 2023-03-03, Reason_for_Visit: Annual physical, Notes: Reports feeling well overall. Exercises regularly, occasional shortness of breath during spring pollen season., Assessment: Mild persistent asthma; overall good control., Plan: Continue montelukast nightly; renew albuterol inhaler; advise use of HEPA air filter at home; schedule spirometry next visit.

Patient_ID: FAM2025-001, Name: Emily Chen, Age: 32, Gender: Female, Occupation: Software Engineer, Allergies: Penicillin (rash), Past_Medical_History: Mild asthma, Seasonal allergies, Family_History: Mother: Type 2 diabetes; Father: Hypertension, Current_Medications: Albuterol inhaler PRN, Montelukast 10 mg nightly, Visit_Date: 2023-06-10, Reason_for_Visit: Wheezing after hiking trip, Notes: Chest tightness after hiking; used inhaler twice. No cough or fever., Assessment: Exercise-induced bronchospasm triggered by dust exposure., Plan: Add budesonide inhaler for 2 weeks; advise pre-exercise albuterol use; wear mask in dusty areas.

Patient_ID: FAM2025-001, Name: Emily Chen, Age: 32, Gender: Female, Occupation: Software Engineer, Allergies: Penicillin (rash), Past_Medical_History: Mild asthma, Seasonal allergies, Family_History: Mother: Type 2 diabetes; Father: Hypertension, Current_Medications: Albuterol inhaler PRN, Montelukast 10 mg nightly, Visit_Date: 2023-12-18, Reason_for_Visit: Fatigue and poor sleep, Notes: Works late; averages 5 hours sleep; denies depression., Assessment: Sleep deprivation; rule out iron deficiency., Plan: Order CBC, iron, and thyroid tests; counsel on sleep hygiene; limit caffeine after noon.
